name: DetectIntentResponse

params.name: data.response_id
params.description: The unique identifier of the response. It can be used to locate a response in the training example set or for reporting issues.

params.name: data.query_result
params.description: The selected results of the conversational query or event processing. See alternative_query_results for additional potential results.

params.name: data.webhook_status
params.description: Specifies the status of the webhook request.

params.name: data.output_audio
params.description: The audio data bytes encoded as specified in the request. Note: The output audio is generated based on the values of default platform text responses found in the query_result.fulfillment_messages field. If multiple default text responses exist, they will be concatenated when generating audio. If no default platform text responses exist, the generated audio content will be empty. In some scenarios, multiple output audio fields may be present in the response structure. In these cases, only the top-most-level audio output has content.

params.name: data.output_audio_config
params.description: The config used by the speech synthesizer to generate the output audio.
